issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: 'euca-configure-vmware --edit' does not work with empty config

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I'm having trouble bringing up a Vmware cluster in QA. There appears to be a chicken and egg problem? The request to set the broker's configuration XML is getting denied because the service is not ready. The service is not ready because it's missing its configuration?  

Below is the xml/file, the modify property request/response, and the exception on the Broker. The service state is reporting 'Broken'. 
Am I missing something obvious or is this a 3.4 regression?
Thanks!
-M


Request/Response, service states, properties, etc:

{code}
[root@h-26 ~]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE autoscaling     autoscaling     10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/AutoScaling    arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE dns             eucalyptus      10.111.5.26     BROKEN          56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Dns            arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE storage         PARTI00         SC_30           ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.30:8773/services/Storage        arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_30/
SERVICE storage         PARTI01         SC_36           ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.36:8773/services/Storage        arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:storage:SC_36/
SERVICE loadbalancing   loadbalancing   10.111.5.26     NOTREADY        56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/LoadBalancing  arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE notifications   eucalyptus      10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Notifications  arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE reporting       bootstrap       10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Reporting      arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE cloudwatch      cloudwatch      10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/CloudWatch     arn:euca:bootstrap:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE cluster         PARTI00         CC_30           ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.30:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC     arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_30/
SERVICE cluster         PARTI01         CC_35           ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.35:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC     arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:cluster:CC_35/
SERVICE bootstrap       bootstrap       10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Empyrean       arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.111.5.26/
SERVICE eucalyptus      eucalyptus      10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Eucalyptus     arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.5.26/
SERVICE vmwarebroker    PARTI01         vmwarebroker-10.111.5.35        BROKEN          56      http://10.111.5.35:8773/services/VMwareBroker   arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI01:vmwarebroker:vmwarebroker-10.111.5.35/
SERVICE tokens          eucalyptus      10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Tokens         arn:euca:eucalyptus::tokens:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE jetty           eucalyptus      10.111.5.26     ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Jetty          arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.5.26/
SERVICE walrus          walrus          WS_26           ENABLED         56      http://10.111.5.26:8773/services/Walrus         arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_26/

################################################
